Main content starts here, tab to start navigating
About Us
Turn 3 Sports Bar has been a local neighborhood establishment since 1986. We offer affordable drinks in a relaxed, easy going atmosphere where the regulars and staff will soon know your name. We can't wait to meet you!
Renovated
In December of 2018, Turn 3 Sports Bar took a different turn. With new ownership, the entire place has changed for the better. The inside has been completely renovated. It is no longer a smoking venue. We now have a kitchen and serve food til 4:30am! The environment is very refreshing. We pride ourselves in being the cleanest sports bar in Boca Raton - hands down.
Events
We have several daily events. You can look forward to our free pool day on Mondays. We host a tournament at 8pm. It's non-apa. Anyone can join and there's a pool of money split between winners. Tuesdays we host poker tournaments and have our dart league team defending our home at night. Thursdays we have poker again with a dart tournament that follows. This tournament is open to anyone and is not league affiliated. Friday and Saturday we have live bands that rock the stage from 9:30pm-1:30am. Perfect for a group or birthday party. It's free to enter. Come listen to your favorite songs being played live. Sunday night we have karaoke. Whether you're a shooter, a thrower, a dancer, or singer - we look forward to seeing you! We have tons of fun activities waiting for you. So make that turn, to Turn 3.
Food
Turn 3 has food now! We have a menu full of great tasting appetizers, sandwiches, burgers, wings, salads, desserts, etc... Our kitchen stays open til last call - 4:30am. Whether it’s for lunch, happy hour or dinner, our guests can expect fast, quality food from our kitchen. The menu evolves and changes over the year so be on the lookout for new and limited time offers!
